detDesc1.title: Original Seavalanche colors
detDesc1.desc:
These are the colors which Seavalanche possesses that doesn't get to pass down to her pieces.

Cream and light blue color showed her softness, gold her Aether attribute, and green her Nature attribute.

detDesc2.title: The pink colors
detDesc2.desc: Mostly passed down to Vesnea and Zumiko. Mostly to represent feminine aura.

detDesc3.title: Her heterochromatic eyes
detDesc3.desc:
Even if she got odd-colored eyes, her pieces don't. The left eye is yellow colored, and the right eye is green colored.

It's mostly due to her immense Aether and Nature energy. But it's also due to show her multitalent abilities in other things.

detDesc4.title: The soft colors
detDesc4.desc:
She got a cream-colored earring on her left ear, which doesn't even pierce through her ear. It's just clipping or hanging on the outside. It's a soft color and it's also mainly to show her feminity.

Her white tail ends with a light blue colored tip. It's what passed down to Seava, mainly to represent her hidden power / alternate power.

detDesc1.title: Seava's blue colors
detDesc1.desc: With affinity to water and ice, both darker blue and lighter blue are his colors. The cream color is mostly for representing sand.

detDesc2.title: Seava's Tempest Mode
detDesc2.desc: In addition to his regular colors, he got extra colors in this mode. As the name suggest, this is when he got the power of storm so yellow fits his new electrical energy.

detDesc3.title: Seava's Zephyr Mode
detDesc3.desc: When he got this mode, he strengthened his wind power. Flowing like the wind, the cyan color fits his power and his new personality.

detDesc4.title: The wave pattern
detDesc4.desc: He got a special color that shows waves mark all over his body. This color symbolize the power to utilize water and ice at the same time.

detDesc1.title: The inherited color
detDesc1.desc:
These are the pink colors that is inherited from Seavalanche.

She has taken most of the feminity trait of the original Seavalanche out of all of her pieces.

detDesc2.title: Seavalanche Mode
detDesc2.desc:
When she got a part of Seava's power, she reached what we called Seavalanche Mode.

This is a form believed to be able to match the original Seavalanche's power. But it is mostly only a combination of Seava and Vesnea, so it is actually not quite the same.

detDesc3.title: Vesnea's Blossom Mode
detDesc3.desc: As the name suggest, it is mainly her with a newfound Nature attribute. Her body is covered with leaves-like fabric.

detDesc1.title: Sun's glow
detDesc1.desc: Korazu inherited Myth Seavalanche's golden shine.

detDesc1.title: Moon's shine
detDesc1.desc: Uzakon inherited Myth Seavalanche's hidden power without the golden shine.

detDesc1.title: Star's flame
detDesc1.desc: Zumiko inherited Myth Seavalanche's burst of power.
